passages.title: Intro
passages.desc: Your name is Colton. You are a 6 year old Kindergarten boy. You are about to have an adventure!

choices.desc: Wake up and go to school

passages.title: Classroom
passages.desc: You are at your seat in class. You are a little sad. Your teacher Mrs. Z is not here today, you have a sub. Uh-oh, it feels like you have to pee.

choices.desc: Raise your hand, and ask to go to the bathroom.
Wait until the teacher is done talking.

passages.title: Classroom
passages.desc: Uh-oh, if you don't go soon you may pee your pants.

choices.desc: Quickly raise your hand and ask to go pee, NOW
Wait just a little bit longer...

passages.title: Classroom
passages.desc: Oh no, you've had an accident and your pants are soaked. You are sent to the office and your mom takes you home. This was not a good day.

passages.title: Hallway
passages.desc: On the way to the bathroom, you notice small green pipe on the side of hallway.

passages.title: Pipe
passages.desc: The pipe is way too small for you to enter and you really have to go!

passages.title: Bathroom
passages.desc: Finally, the bathroom! You go, and wash your hands. Then you notice a red hat with an M on the front on the sink.

passages.title: Bathroom
passages.desc: You are back in the bathroom. The red hat with an M on the front is still on the sink.

passages.title: Bathroom
passages.desc: You put on the hat. Suddenly everything looks big. The top of your lip feels fuzzy. What is going on?

choices.desc: Wait for someone else to open the door

passages.title: Bathroom
passages.desc: The door is huge and you are not strong enough to open it.

choices.desc: Wait for someone else to open the door

passages.title: Bathroom
passages.desc: Another boy opens the door and you quickly scurry back to the hallway.

choices.desc: Wait for someone else to open the door

passages.title: Hallway
passages.desc: You start back. You hear the teacher talking. It sounds boring.

passages.title: Hallway
passages.desc: You start back. The pipe now looks big enough to climb into. You hear the teacher talking. It sounds boring.
As you approach the pipe, you are suddenly sucked in. Everything is dark inside, and you quickly pick up speed. Suddenly you emerge outside, but things look.... different... To be continued...
The rest of the day is normal but for the rest of the year, Mrs. Z never came back. It turned out to not be much of an adventure after all.
You hear loud footsteps. Oh no! A giant foot steps on you!
